name: contentful-management-tools
description: Tools and scripts for managing Contentful CMS content

scripts.setup: cmd /c "if not exist .env copy .env.example .env && echo Configuration file created. Please edit .env with your Contentful credentials."
scripts.clean: cmd /c "if exist validation-report-*.json del validation-report-*.json && if exist deletion-report-*.json del deletion-report-*.json && echo Cleaned up old reports"
scripts.deletion-config: node -e "console.log('\n=== Entry Deletion Mapping Configuration ==='); const dp = require('./src/utils/entry-deletion-processor'); const proc = new dp(); const summary = proc.getRulesSummary(); console.log('Total rules:', summary.totalRules); console.log('Enabled rules:', summary.enabledRules); console.log('Content types covered:', summary.contentTypes.join(', ')); console.log('Environments:', summary.environments.join(', ')); console.log('\nConfig file: config/entry-deletion-mappings.json');"
scripts.status: node -e "console.log('Contentful Management Tools v1.0.0'); console.log('Status: Production Ready'); console.log('Documentation: docs/README.md');"
scripts.help: node -e "console.log('Available commands:'); console.log('  npm run publish-entry-only  - Enhanced entry publishing with deletion mapping'); console.log('  npm run entry-migration     - Cross-space migration'); console.log('  npm run content-transform   - Content type transformation'); console.log('  npm run deletion-test       - Test deletion rules (dry run)'); console.log('  npm run deletion-validate   - Validate deletion mapping config'); console.log('  npm test                    - Run integration tests'); console.log('  npm run demo                - View feature demonstration'); console.log('  npm run setup               - Initial project setup');"
scripts.validate-config: node -e "try { require('dotenv').config(); console.log('✅ Configuration valid'); } catch(e) { console.log('❌ Configuration error:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
